reason.strongAgainst: Anti-Mage excels against mana-dependent heroes, burning their mana pool quickly.
reason.weakAgainst: Struggles against heroes that can lock him down before he escapes or burst him.
reason.itemCounters: Black King Bar blocks his mana burn, Orchid prevents Blink escape.

reason.strongAgainst: Axe dominates melee carries and illusion heroes with Counter Helix and Berserker's Call.
reason.weakAgainst: Ranged carries can kite him, Ursa and LC can out-duel him.
reason.itemCounters: Force Staff to escape call, Ghost Scepter to avoid physical damage.

reason.strongAgainst: Bane's disables shut down mobile carries and escape heroes.
reason.weakAgainst: Can be interrupted during Fiend's Grip, weak to AoE stuns.
reason.itemCounters: BKB prevents Nightmare and Grip, Linken's blocks single target.

reason.strongAgainst: Thirst reveals low HP fleeing heroes, Rupture punishes movement.
reason.weakAgainst: Heroes with dispels can remove Rupture, tanky or healing heroes survive.
reason.itemCounters: TP scroll to escape Rupture, Force Staff/Eul's for repositioning.

reason.strongAgainst: Slows and roots kite melee heroes effectively.
reason.weakAgainst: Extremely squishy, gap closers and burst damage kill her instantly.
reason.itemCounters: Pipe of Insight reduces her magical damage significantly.

reason.strongAgainst: High physical DPS with slow destroys squishy supports.
reason.weakAgainst: Gap closers and high mobility heroes can reach her easily.
reason.itemCounters: Blink Dagger to close distance, Silver Edge breaks Marksmanship.

reason.strongAgainst: Echo Slam devastates illusion and summon-based heroes.
reason.weakAgainst: Silencer prevents combos, Rubick can steal Echo Slam.
reason.itemCounters: BKB prevents stuns, Linken's blocks Fissure.

reason.strongAgainst: Sleight hits multiple heroes, escapes with remnants.
reason.weakAgainst: Silence prevents escape, root keeps him in place.
reason.itemCounters: Orchid silence before remnant, Gleipnir roots.

reason.strongAgainst: Chronosphere traps immobile carries perfectly.
reason.weakAgainst: Can be burst inside Chrono, Silencer prevents it entirely.
reason.itemCounters: Eul's to survive Chrono timing, Assault Cuirass for armor.

reason.strongAgainst: Combo damage devastates grouped or slow heroes.
reason.weakAgainst: Gap closers and silence prevent spell combos.
reason.itemCounters: Blink to dodge abilities, Orchid to silence.

reason.strongAgainst: Blade Fury immunity lets him kill supports easily.
reason.weakAgainst: Can be locked down or out-carried by harder carries.
reason.itemCounters: Ghost Scepter makes Omnislash useless, Heaven's Halberd disarms.

reason.strongAgainst: Duel forces 1v1 fights where she excels.
reason.weakAgainst: Heroes who can save Duel targets or out-heal Duel damage.
reason.itemCounters: Ghost Scepter prevents Duel damage, Eul's delays it.

reason.strongAgainst: Multiple disables lock down mobile cores effectively.
reason.weakAgainst: High HP tanky heroes survive his burst, BKB users ignore him.
reason.itemCounters: BKB blocks all his abilities, Linken's prevents Hex.

reason.strongAgainst: Massive crits one-shot squishy heroes.
reason.weakAgainst: Heroes with lockdown or Break disable her evasion.
reason.itemCounters: MKB ignores Blur evasion, Silver Edge applies Break.

reason.strongAgainst: Hook combo destroys squishy immobile supports.
reason.weakAgainst: Mobile heroes can dodge hooks, BKB piercing abilities counter him.
reason.itemCounters: Force Staff pushes allies out of Dismember, Linken's blocks Hook.

reason.strongAgainst: Spell Steal turns enemy ultimates against them.
reason.weakAgainst: Right-click carries don't rely on stolen spells.
reason.itemCounters: Orchid silence prevents Spell Steal.

reason.strongAgainst: Picks off lone supports and escapes ganks easily.
reason.weakAgainst: AoE disables, Bloodseeker Thirst, and lockdown counter him.
reason.itemCounters: Detection reveals Shadow Dance, Gleipnir roots him.

reason.strongAgainst: Long range attacks destroy low mobility supports.
reason.weakAgainst: Gap closers instantly kill him due to low HP pool.
reason.itemCounters: Blink to close distance, Abyssal to lock him down.

reason.strongAgainst: Haunt global presence destroys squishy backliners.
reason.weakAgainst: Mana burn, early aggression, and Silence are problematic.
reason.itemCounters: Silver Edge Break removes Dispersion, Spirit Vessel prevents healing.

reason.strongAgainst: Fury Swipes shreds single targets in seconds.
reason.weakAgainst: Kiting and disables prevent him from attacking.
reason.itemCounters: Force Staff kites him, Heaven's Halberd disarms him.

reason.strongAgainst: Global nuke and vision reveals supports and low HP heroes.
reason.weakAgainst: High magic resistance heroes and Anti-Mage burn his mana.
reason.itemCounters: Pipe of Insight and BKB reduce his damage significantly.

reason.strongAgainst: Rolling Thunder disrupts immobile backliners.
reason.weakAgainst: Silence stops Rolling Thunder, roots and stuns interrupt.
reason.itemCounters: BKB during roll, Abyssal to stun him out.
